Description:
The FHIR PractitionerRole resource consists of a location and types of services that practitioners can provide for an organization.

Starting in the August 2019 version of Epic, this resource accepts multiple comma-delimited values for practitioner, location, or organization.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: A practitioner's identifier. A successful identifier search comprises of a token that is a URN:OID: + the code system, and a code in the format identifier=code system|code.

location.Name: location
location.Description: One of the locations at which this practitioner provides care.

organization.Name: organization
organization.Description: The organization that the practitioner represents or acts on behalf of.

phone.Name: phone
phone.Description: A value in a phone contact.

practitioner.Name: practitioner
practitioner.Description: A practitioner that can provide the defined services for the organization.

role.Name: role
role.Description: The role a practitioner can perform at an organization.

specialty.Name: specialty
specialty.Description: The practitioner's specialty at an organization.

telecom.Name: telecom
telecom.Description: The value in any kind of contact.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

PractitionerRole.Name: PractitionerRole
PractitionerRole.Description: An instance of the STU3 PractitionerRole resource.

active.Name: active
active.Description: Whether the unique address is active.

location.Name: location
location.Description: A location containing address information for the provider. This element isn't returned in a patient-facing context.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://fhir.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-practitionerrole

telecom.Name: telecom
telecom.Description: Contact information specific to the unique address.
